Name: samurai_jazz
About the game: An action/adventure game taking ques from both film-noir and samurai-drama's of old, 'samurai_jazz' takes players on an adventure through an enigmatic city, engaging in sword-fights, encounters with mythological beings, and quirky dialog with the local inhabitants presented with a pseudo 8-bit style. While action remains the central focus, a bit of detective work and puzzle-solving will become necessary while adventuring in this pixelated nightmare. Features: Do battle with enemy swordsmen and demons Adventure through an enigmatic city and interact with it's citizens Presented with 8-bit graphics and electro-jazz soundtrack Supports Xbox 360 Controller
Meta Title: samurai_jazz: Jan 27, 2015, Blaze Epic and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on samurai_jazz? Check out the release date (Jan 27, 2015), developer insights from Blaze Epic, and a complete game summary.
